issues.description: Hero lacks 8-second 'what is this' comprehension without concrete visual anchors
issues.rationale: Visitors bail if they can't parse value prop immediately. 'Operating system' is too abstract without visual proof.

issues.description: No sticky CTA creates conversion dead zones during 3000px scroll journey
issues.rationale: Users lose momentum between CTAs. Mobile users especially need persistent action path during long scroll.

issues.description: Trust proof buried below fold instead of integrated into hero narrative
issues.rationale: Small business owners need immediate risk reversal. 'Control' promise needs instant visual validation.

issues.description: Pricing comprehension requires horizontal scrolling on mobile breakpoints
issues.rationale: Comparison fatigue kills conversions. Mobile users abandon when they can't parse tiers in one view.

issues.description: Section order buries problem/solution after features, breaking narrative flow
issues.rationale: Users need problem validation before feature lists. Current order assumes pre-sold visitors.

issues.description: Mobile hero stacking puts CTA below 600px fold on common devices
issues.rationale: First action opportunity invisible without scroll. Mobile bounce rate spikes when CTA requires hunting.

issues.description: Typography hierarchy lacks scanning anchors with weak h2/body contrast
issues.rationale: 10-second scan test fails. Users can't extract value props from undifferentiated text walls.

issues.description: Audit log pattern missing from observability promise validation
issues.rationale: Control promise needs tangible UI proof. Abstract claims without interface examples create trust gap.

issues.description: Feature cards lack visual hierarchy for benefit vs capability distinction
issues.rationale: Users parse features but miss outcomes. Card design doesn't guide eye from 'what' to 'why'.

issues.description: Proof bar placement at footer instead of above pricing misses decision moment
issues.rationale: Social proof works best at hesitation points. Footer placement wastes trust signals.

suggestedFixes.fix: Add dashboard preview screenshot at 60% opacity behind hero text. Include 3 concrete UI elements showing control.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual anchor makes 'operating system' concept instantly parseable. Screenshots build trust faster than claims.

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement sticky CTA bar at 60px height on mobile, 48px desktop. Trigger after 20% scroll with 'Start Free' label.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Persistent action path prevents conversion dead zones. Lower profile than floating button preserves content visibility.

suggestedFixes.fix: Embed mini audit log component (3 recent actions) directly in hero at 40% width. Real-time animation on load.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Immediate proof of observability promise. Animation draws eye and demonstrates 'living' system.

suggestedFixes.fix: Stack pricing tiers vertically on mobile with expandable comparison row. Default to recommended tier expanded.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Eliminates horizontal scroll. Progressive disclosure reduces cognitive load while maintaining comparison ability.

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder to: Hero → Problem/Solution (combined 400px) → How It Works → Suite → Pricing → FAQ.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Problem validation before features. Compressed problem section maintains momentum to solution showcase.

suggestedFixes.fix: Split hero into 2-row grid on mobile. Row 1: headline + subhead (280px). Row 2: CTA + trust badge (120px).
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guarantees CTA visibility at 400px total. Trust badge adjacent to CTA reduces friction at decision point.

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase h2/body contrast to 2.5:1 weight ratio. Set body line-height to 1.7 with max 65ch line length.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates visual rhythm for scanning. Optimal line length reduces reading fatigue and improves comprehension.

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 'Activity Feed' micro-component (200px height) in How It Works section showing 5 sample entries.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Tangible UI proof of observability. Sample data makes abstract promise concrete and believable.

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 24px outcome badge at top-left of each feature card. Use brand.primary at 20% opacity for background.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual hierarchy guides eye to benefit first. Color coding creates scannable benefit pattern across cards.

suggestedFixes.fix: Relocate proof bar to slot between How It Works and Pricing. Include 3 metrics + 2 logo lockups at 80px height.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Intercepts at peak hesitation point. Metrics + logos provide both quantitative and brand trust signals.

assumptions: Homepage is approximately 3000px in total scroll height
Pricing section has 3 or more tiers requiring comparison
Current hero lacks dashboard/UI preview elements
